articles.description: Another ransomware operation known as 'Black Kingdom' is exploiting the Microsoft Exchange Server ProxyLogon vulnerabilities to encrypt servers.
articles.content:

articles.author: Dale Smith
articles.title: Nuke your Alexa smart home to get rid of 'ghost' devices - CNET
articles.description: Renaming a bunch of your smart home devices without updating Alexa will make a mess of things, but you can use this trick to update them all at once.
articles.content:
Alexa will lose track of devices if you rename them, but you can set your smart home right in one fell swoop.
Ry Crist/CNET
If you have more than a couple of smart home devices, you've probably ren… [+2017 chars]
